content:
(The scene opens with the whole gang sitting at their usual table at Patty's Pub, drinking their beers and joking around. Frank walks in and joins the group)

Frank: "What's the topic of discussion today?"

Dennis: "Mac here thinks JFK died of natural causes."

Frank: "Oh, that old chestnut. I've got a theory. He was killed by a time-traveling alien."

(The gang stares at Frank in disbelief)

Charlie: "Frank, you know that's not true. You were the one who convinced us to invest in the JFK conspiracy theory-themed strip club."

(Everyone starts laughing)

Mac: "I'm telling you, there's more to the story. And I have the evidence to prove it."

(Mac pulls out a stack of conspiracy theory books and begins to read from one)

Dennis: "Oh please, you're just reading from some crackpot's website."

Mac: "This is from the Smithsonian, you moron!"

(The argument escalates with the gang getting increasingly confused and frustrated)

Charlie: "Wait a minute, JFK died in the 60s, right? So why does it even matter now?"

Frank: "Yeah, Mac, you're like the Nightman of conspiracy theories, always singing the same song."

(Mac glares at Frank)

Dennis: "Exactly! It doesn't matter, let's just drop it."

Mac: "I'll drop it when the truth is finally told!"

(The scene ends with the gang shaking their heads and continuing to drink and make fun of Mac)
